title: Welcome to My Journey
subtitle: From teaching code to building healthcare platforms

sections.content: I'm Austin Walker, a Technical Product Manager who bridges the gap between clinical complexity and shipping code. I don't just write tickets—I prototype with AI, write API specifications, debug production issues, and build systems that navigate real regulatory complexity.

This journey will walk you through how I got here—from teaching 170+ students at a coding bootcamp, to engineering at a telehealth startup, to co-leading product strategy for a multi-tenant healthcare platform.

content: How I approach healthcare product management differently than consumer tech
The specific platforms I've built and the problems I've solved
Real metrics, real outcomes, and real lessons learned
Why I'm passionate about building in regulated, complex domains

sections.title: Fair Warning
sections.content: This isn't a generic PM portfolio. It's detailed, technical, and healthcare-focused. If you're looking for surface-level feature lists, this isn't it. If you want to understand how technical PMs approach complex problems, keep reading.
